pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)1 Fuse Cherry, 1 Potato, 1 Empty Seed Packet, 25 Sun value.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Low Profile. Needs time to prepare. Can use a Small Sun to speed it up.
$(br)$(#bd951a)They say he leaves everything to the last minute, but he says nothing. He's too busy thinking about his investment strategy.

pages.title: Blaster
pages.text: $(#25228d)Potato Mines pack a powerful punch, but they need a while to arm themselves.
